Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openam.cts.continuous.ContinuousQuery

  • Packages that use ContinuousQuery 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.cts.continuous
    Defines the interfaces necessary for performing continuous queries through the CTS agnostic of the underlying datastore implementation.
    org.forgerock.openam.cts.impl
    Implementation classes that provide the LDAP code to communicate with LDAP and process the data to and from.
    org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.api
    The data layer represents a collection of classes for providing connections to services within OpenAM that require LDAP connections.
    org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.api.query  
    org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.impl.ldap  
    org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.impl.tasks
    Tasks are asynchronous representations of API calls to the CTS.
    org.openidentityplatform.openam.cassandra  

    • Uses of ContinuousQuery in org.forgerock.openam.cts.continuous

      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.cts.continuous that return ContinuousQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContinuousQuery ContinuousQuery.addContinuousQueryListener(ContinuousQueryListener listener)
      Adds a generic listener to the set of objects that will be informed of changes according to the queried filter.
      ContinuousQuery ContinuousQuery.removeContinuousQueryListener(ContinuousQueryListener listener)
      Removes a generic listener from the set of objects that will be informed of changes according to the queried filter.

      ContinuousQuery TokenStorageAdapter.startContinuousQuery(TokenFilter filter, ContinuousQueryListener listener)

    • Uses of ContinuousQuery in org.forgerock.openam.sm.datalayer.api.query

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract ContinuousQuery QueryBuilder.executeContinuousQuery(ContinuousQueryListener listener)
